description: Non-material amendment to planning permission P/2009/3255 dated 02/03/2012 (Redevelopment of site to provide a building of between two and six storeys in height comprising ground floor commercial floorspace with service yard and 26 flats above (4 x 1-Bed, 13 x 2-Bed, 7 x 3-Bed and 2 x 4-Bed units) including 9 units for affordable rent and 3 units for shared ownership, with communal / private amenity areas, roof terraces and balconies) for an amendment to the affordable housing tenure from 9 affordable rent units and  3 x intermediate flats to 12 affordable rented units, together with a deed of variation to the legal agreement.
decision_conditions: The proposed non-material amendments to planning permission P/2009/3255 granted on appeal ref: APP/A5270/A/11/2160093/NWF dated 02/03/12 for an amendment to the affordable housing tenure from 9 affordable rent units and  3 x intermediate flats to 12 affordable rented units together with a deed of variation to the legal agreement are considered to be non-material in accordance with section 96A of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990, Greater Flexibility Guidance' Communities & Local Government (2010), and Ealing Council's Code of Practice for Minor Amendments to Planning Permissions (1999).
